SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils

Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.Matrix
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Matrix extends Object implements Serializable

Class that implements a matrix which contains Tiles.

It is used as a basis for the board and the bookshelves.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Matrix

      public Matrix(int rows, int columns)

      The constructor that ought to be used to create a matrix.

      It creats a matrix with a set number of rows and columns and initializes every cell with empty tiles.

      Parameters:
      rows - The number of rows.
      columns - The number of columns.

    • Matrix

      public Matrix(Matrix mat)

      A constructor that creates a copy a given Matrix.

      Parameters:
      mat - The matrix you want to create a copy of.
